tool_description: Icon Creator API is a free web api for creating flat icon with custom dimensions, padding, background shape, background color, and color. You can use this API for over 2500 icon.
name: Icon Creator
title: Icon Creator

api_list.name: Create icon
api_list.description: Check icon category and names here http://www.you-tracker.com/API/IconCreator/Client

optional_parameters.name: padding
optional_parameters.description: The padding of Icon.  Default is 'dimensions / 4'.

optional_parameters.name: bgShape
optional_parameters.description: The background shape of icon.  Supported values: TransparentCNT, SquareBG, CircleOlBG, CircleBG.  Default is 'TransparentCNT'.

optional_parameters.name: bgColor
optional_parameters.description: The background color of icon (in hex).  Default is 'FFFFFF'.

optional_parameters.name: color
optional_parameters.description: The Icon Color (in hex)  Default is 'FFFFFF'.
